etymology.description: 艸(艸) (cǎo, "grass") + 耦(耦) (ǒu, "to pair") = plant related to lotus -> lotus root
etymology.interpretation: The character 藕(藕) (ǒu, "lotus root") combines the grass/plant radical 艸(艸) (cǎo, "grass"), signifying a botanical connection, with the phonetic component 耦(耦) (ǒu, "to pair"), representing the sound, illustrating the phonetic and semantic aspect of this character.

examples.chinese: 藕是一种营养丰富的食材(藕是一種營養豐富的食材)。
examples.pinyin: ǒu shì yī zhǒng yíngyǎng fēngfù de shícái.
examples.english: Lotus root is a nutritious ingredient.

examples.chinese: 我在市场买到了新鲜的藕(我在市場買到了新鮮的藕)，朋友推荐用藕做汤(朋友推薦用藕做湯)。
examples.pinyin: wǒ zài shìchǎng mǎidàole xīnxiān de ǒu, péngyǒu tuījiàn yòng ǒu zuò tāng.
examples.english: I bought fresh lotus root at the market, and my friend recommended making soup with it.
